projects.title: AIReel Studio
projects.short: A tool to generate short, AI-assisted video reels with auto-captions and smart edits.
projects.description: AIReel Studio is an innovative web application that leverages AI to help content creators produce engaging short-form videos automatically. The platform uses advanced algorithms to analyze video content, generate captions, apply smart edits, and optimize for social media platforms. Built with a modern tech stack, it features real-time processing, intuitive UI, and seamless integration with popular video formats. This project showcases my skills in full-stack development, AI integration, and media processing.

projects.title: DishDash
projects.short: A responsive and animated food delivery website with seamless UI/UX and interactivity.
projects.description: DishDash is a responsive and animated food delivery website built with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+). It features an interactive meal catalog, add-to-cart functionality, animated navigation, and a secure login/registration system. Designed with a mobile-first approach using CSS Grid and Flexbox, it ensures smooth performance, accessibility, and seamless adaptability across devices. As the sole developer, I was responsible for UI/UX design, responsive layouts, animations, interactivity, authentication, and testing.

projects.title: ShopEase
projects.short: A tool to generate short, AI-assisted video reels with auto-captions and smart edits.
projects.description: ShopEase is a responsive e-commerce shopping website designed to provide a seamless online shopping experience. It features a clean homepage with product categories, a promotional banner, and a newsletter subscription popup. Users can browse products, view details, and manage their cart with an intuitive interface. The site is built with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+), focusing on responsiveness, interactivity, and performance optimization. I implemented modern UI/UX design principles, animations, and accessibility support to ensure it works smoothly across devices and browsers.

projects.title: Flappy Bird Game
projects.short: A fun browser-based Flappy Bird clone built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
projects.description: Flappy Bird Game is a simple yet addictive browser-based clone of the classic Flappy Bird. Developed using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+), it features smooth gameplay, gravity mechanics, collision detection, score tracking, and a restart option. The project demonstrates the use of JavaScript for game logic, animations, and event handling, while CSS ensures a visually appealing layout. Designed to run seamlessly in modern browsers, the game highlights core concepts of front-end game development.

projects.title: To-Do List
projects.short: A simple and interactive To-Do List app to manage daily tasks effectively.
projects.description: To-Do List App is a lightweight and responsive task management tool built with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+). It allows users to add, edit, mark as complete, and delete tasks, offering a smooth and intuitive experience. The app is designed with a clean UI and local storage integration to persist tasks even after page reload. This project demonstrates DOM manipulation, event handling, and front-end interactivity using vanilla JavaScript.

projects.title: Rubik's Cube
projects.short: A fully functional 3D Rubik’s Cube simulation built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
projects.description: Rubik’s Cube is an interactive and fully functional 3D cube simulation created using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+). Users can rotate the cube in real time, shuffle it, and attempt to solve it just like a physical cube. The project demonstrates advanced CSS transforms, 3D animations, and logic handling for cube movements. With a smooth and responsive design, it provides an engaging puzzle-solving experience directly in the browser.

projects.title: PDF to Audio Book
projects.short: A Python tool that converts PDF documents into audiobooks using text-to-speech.
projects.description: PDF to Audio Book is a Python-based project that transforms PDF documents into audio format, making reading more accessible and convenient. It extracts text from PDF files and converts it into natural-sounding speech using Python libraries. This project is designed for students, researchers, and readers who prefer listening to content on the go. It highlights text extraction, text-to-speech integration, file handling, and automation through Python.
